descriptions:
['DescriptionThe Noble House Real Estate is excited to add in our portfolio another luxury villa for sale  in the most coveted community in Dubai - Emirates Hills. The 2 storey villa offers 5 ensuite bedrooms with a built up area of 12,000 sq.ft and plot size area of 16,935 sq.ft. 
The property has Arabian-influenced interiors, it features bold use of colors in its walls, ceiling and furniture from  living rooms to bedrooms. The tones are generally earthy, with liberal use of rich reds, golds and oranges. The walls, floors, furnishings, and art – everything contributes deep color to space.
The furniture is elaborately carved and the lighting fixtures highly embellished. Metallic elements are used in this home decor, with gold dominating the theme. And textiles of myriad patterns and textures are generously employed to imbue the Arabic room with sumptuous style.
The property features a barbecue area in well manicured lawn and a swimming pool for recreation purposes.
Emirates Hills is the flagship community of Emirates Living, the most sought-after community in Dubai where high net worth individuals live – consisting of exclusive custom-built properties offering amazing views.
To arrange a viewing pls call The Noble House Real Estate at +97144566135 or for more details and images of the property, visit our website at www.tnh.ae.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionEngel & Voelkers proudly offers this amazing 1 bedroom apartment in Al Haseer - Shoreline Apartments.\xa0The apartment is well designed with an excellent living and dining space, the kitchen is built with a breakfast\xa0bar and a large balcony overlooking the sea.\xa0Property Details:\xa0Riva Beach ClubType B1144 sq.ft.\xa0Basement Parking24-hour front desk\xa024 hours security\xa0The Palm Jumeirah is one of the most ambitious real-estate developments on earth, named as the 8th wonder of the world as it can be seen from space as a beautiful palm shaped land.\xa0A true resort-style development, it is described as not just a place to be, but rather an experience. It\xa0features villas, apartment buildings, beaches, marinas, restaurants, and a variety of retail outlets.\xa0Engel & Voelkers is one of the worlds leading service companies specializing in the brokerage of residential and commercial properties, yachts and aviation, with 800 offices in over 30 countries.Call us today to know more about this property!']
